data.title: The Smart Guide to Jetex London Biggin Hill
data.meta_description: The comprehensive Smart Guide to Jetex London details all you need to know about the newest FBO at Biggin HiIl Airport, dubbed the ‘modern gateway to the capital’.
data.text:
27 November 2023: Jetex London is the newest FBO at Biggin HiIl Airport and since it opened in January 2023, it has been welcoming international travellers to London from across the globe and has even been dubbed the ‘modern gateway to the capital’.

The stylish FBO (fixed-base operator) is perfectly located just outside of Central London meaning our clients are guaranteed a prompt departure away from busy London airports. Our clients love the convenient location as well as the exemplary peronalised service offered by the efficient, attentive and experienced staff.

Here’s our comprehensive Smart Guide to Jetex London Biggin Hill, detailing all you need to know about this state-of-the-art facility.

Top London location:

As the only dedicated business aviation airport in London, Jetex’s choice of London Biggin Hill reflects the strategic importance of the location. Less than an hour by private car transfer or just six minutes via helicopter from Central London, Biggin Hill is an ideal location for those visiting the British capital.

Award-winning personalised service:

Jetex customers will begin and end their journey in supreme comfort whilst transitioning seamlessly through this contemporary terminal. The on-site U.K. Border Force and customs control ensures that passengers and crew enjoy an efficient ground experience through immigration. Services include on-site parking in front of the terminal, catering arrangements, concierge services, direct ramp access, hangarage, meeting rooms, multilingual staff, and prayer rooms.

Jetex are always really keen to personalise the experience for their passengers as much as possible and will always go the extra mile to make special occasions such as birthdays and anniversaries memorable.

Elegant lounges and world-class facilities:

Jetex London is home to several private lounges, all meticulously designed to offer comfortable, contemporary spaces. With passenger privacy always at the forefront, the 1,9000 square metre private terminal boasts floor-to-ceiling windows, soft lighting for a calming environment, a cigar lounge, shower suites and a fully equipped bathroom, entertainment areas with the latest technology, and retail options.

Unlimited runway:

The airport runway is 1,806 meters long, meaning there are limited range and payload restrictions and even non-stop transatlantic flights can be welcomed.

Take a virtual tour here: https://tour.giraffe360.com/silveraviationjetexbigginhillvirtualtour/

James Gregory, Smart’s Head of VIP Charters, said: “We were delighted when we heard the news that Jetex was opening in Biggin Hill earlier on in the year. The Jetex team has a reputation for providing the highest standards of customer service to business and private jet clients and I am so pleased that all our clients travelling through Biggin Hill are enjoying the seamless experience for themselves now. Biggin HIll was a prime departure airport for us before but now Jetex’s world-renowned offering is established there, the standard has gone up even more.”

Looking to charter a private jet? Call or email us today – [email protected] / + 44 1293 551244

Smart Aviation was founded in 2005 by Managing Director Mark Hawkins, an established sports charter specialist with over 30 years’ experience in senior operational roles within the travel and aviation industry, including managing sports charters at Excel Airways. Over the last 18 years, Mark has led Smart Aviation to become the leaders in global sports chartering. Mark is still very active in sports chartering, frequently providing air travel for global sports teams to key sporting fixtures including Champions League and Premier League football matches, as well as to ice-hockey, boxing, basketball, golf, motorsport and cricket tournaments.
